name: UIUserNotificationActionContext
desc: Constants indicating the amount of space available for displaying actions in a notification.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The default context for displaying the alert. In this context, the full UI is displayed for the notification’s alert. You may specify up to four custom actions in this context.

items.name: case minimal
items.desc: A notification where space is minimal. In this context, a minimal UI is displayed for the notification’s alert. You may specify up to two custom actions in this context.
